title: I can't seem to upgrade skin shards.
body: I got two skin shard but when I tried to upgrade it the game won't let me and I have enough orange essence so I don't know what is going on. I do not own the champion but it's let me still upgrade them. Anyone got the same problem?

replies.body: Oh damm, I'm so sorry for bothering you guys.
Ive been having the same issue too and two oof the champs i do own. not only that i cant re-roll or disenchant any of my skin shards.

*Lew* is correct. You actually have to own the champion (not a free week champ) in order to unlock a skin shard for that champ. You can find more details on how this system works in our [**Hextech Crafting Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233-Hextech-Crafting-Guide).

Please let me know if you have any other questions.
You actually need to own the Champion before you can unlock a skin shard permanently.
